https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/g8bzO7IiTHEAtaN6OsRa9otKIzb.jpg Thamizharasi is the granddaughter of a puppeteer, who develops feelings for Jyothi, the grandson of a rich landlord. However, Thamizharasi's life turns upside down when Jyothi rapes her. Aval Peyar Tamilarasi
